Room.Name: Regalia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Way, south of Maria's Market.
Room.LongDescription: Maria's Market is a small, outdoor marketplace where some goods may be purchased. Much of the fruits and vegetables are not grown in Oceancrest and need to be imported. However, most of the grain and corn comes from inside the city. Maria's Market provides a little bit of diversity for the the citizens' diets.
